text: My first visit. Dr Yeo is sharp to infer from your descriptions and detailed in explaining to you. A true expert in his field. Also approachable and friendly.

I will express my deep appreciation to Dr Yeo Chor Tsien for his professional service accorded to me as one of his patients. He will give a thorough diagnosis before prescribing the necessary medications. He is a very caring doctor and very knowledgeable & very patience despite his hectic daily schedule.
Thank you üôè so much Dr CT Yeo.
for your outstanding medical standard of service.

Dr Yeo Chor Tzien is an unpretentious and down to earth with fatherly love specialist . No airs. He doesn't rush you if you need more insights into your problem be it a call or message. He puts us at ease about the procedures. Highly recommended if you need to see him!!

Dr Yeo is a professional and assuring doctor. I went to see him for my pregnancy asthma and he was very able to put my condition under control. My other child has also been seeing him for her baby asthma and he is very spot-on in his diagnosis. Highly recommend.

Dr Yeo is a very professional and understanding doctor. He listened carefully to my case and prescribed effective medicine without pushing for additional testing which worked well for me. Clinic environment is also comfortable and staff are polite and fast.
